data.description: PCO has developed a full hand tracking control games.Users can play on Quest and Quest2.As a result, we connect friends and communities to enjoy several fun games on the virtual world platform. In addition, PCO lets you create custom avatars to express your inner self, limitless and borderless!Hang out with your friends and meet new people around the world!

changelog.change_log:
PCOVR version 3.0.0 has the following new features,
- New game modes for ultimate worry-free fun in Baccarat, Texas Hold'em and Roulette. The independent accounting system gives all players unlimited chips and balance sheets to see who are the biggest winners and losers.
- New entertainment room and multi-purpose room, where you can enjoy various mini-games, screen sharing and whiteboard functions, suitable for your parties and meetings.
- New ranking system for PCO lovers to showcase your achievements and get some extra rewards.
- The invitation code system allows you to send invitation codes to your friends to join the room directly and easily.

The new PCOVR (version 2.0.0) has the following new features and enhancements
- New game Texas Holdâ€™EM
- New game Roulette
- Controller and gesture optimization
- Bug fixing

The new PCOVR (version 1.0) comes with the following new features and enhancements
- Get more coins with Oculus Top-up (IAP)
- Mute the microphone or other players via the quick menu
- Automatic and manual adjustment of seat height and distance
- New meta avatar system implemented
- Easily redeem and exchange chips with the new system
- New user and currency system for more fun
- Slot machine visual and audio enhancements
